title: My Dear Classmate - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
author: 秦书梦叶
description:
Only afterwards did I realise, the moment we sat together was when over lives became intertwined.

Maybe love could be even more simple, you love me, and I love you. We’ll arrange to be together forever, and that will be enough.

This is a story of youth, and a story of love.>
